#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
vector<int> v(2000000);
vector<int> res(148934);
vector<int> ans;
int main()
{
	int i,j,in=0,cal1,cal2,t,n;
	for(i=2;i<=2000000;i++)
	{
		if(v[i]==0)
		{
			res[in++]=i;
			for(j=2*i;j<=2000000;j=j+i)
			{
				v[j]=1;
			}
		}
	}
	for(i=1;i<148932;i++)
	{
		cal1=res[i]-res[i-1];
		cal2=res[i+1]-res[i];
		if(cal1==cal2)
		{
			ans.push_back(res[i]);
		}
	}
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		printf("%d\n",ans[n-1]);
	}
	return 0;
}
